# Overview <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139"/>

The main goal of this package is extend the available software for [Electron Paramagnetic Resonance (EPR)](https://goldbook.iupac.org/terms/view/E02005) also to open source package which is not dependent on any proprietary platform.
